typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ticket_symbol as string,
		sector as string,
		change as string,
		price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ticket_symbol,
		sector,
		change,
		price
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(ticker_symbol1 = split(ticket_symbol, ':')[2],
		sector1 = split(sector, ':')[2],
		change1 = toFloat(split(change, ':')[2]),
		price1 = toFloat(split(replace(price, '}'), ':')[2])) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		ticket_symbol,
		sector,
		change,
		price,
		ticker_symbol1,
		sector1,
		change1,
		price1
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['textoutput.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['textoutput.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
